articles.description: Ahead of this weekend’s action at Circuit Paul Ricard, we take a look back at last year’s race which saw Max Verstappen overtake title rival Lewis Hamilton for the win on the second to last lap of the Grand Prix.

articles.title: Erik ten Hag reveals Man Utd back-up plan if Frenkie De Jong deal falls through - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United have made Barcelona midfielder Frenkie De Jong their No.1 transfer target this summer but have back up plans if the Dutchman snubs the chance to work with Erik ten Hag again
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag says he will promote from within Manchester United's squad if he fails to land No.1 transfer target Frenkie De Jong.

articles.title: Rohit pleased with ODI show, but admits India have 'a lot of things to improve' - ESPNcricinfo
